name: Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast
description:
Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast is a sports-arcade game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2013. Nintendo published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Inazuma Eleven 3: Bomb Blast on Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Akihiro Hino. Takehiro Fujii directed the game. Natsumi Kameoka and Yasunori Mitsuda scored the game.
